Description: RARE+++ Vintage Jaeger Le-Coultre Gents Oversized wristwatch, 15 Jew. 1930's *SERVICED* ***No reserved price!!!*** Dear customers, we present for sale this pre-owned gorgeous mega rare Vintage Swiss Jaeger Le-Coultre wristwatch. This wristwatch is in excellent working condition. Keeps correct time!!! If you have been collecting watches for a while, I think you’re going to appreciate the following sophisticated antique timepiece that is hard to find nowadays. This watch is prized for reliability, convenience in use, and meets relatively seldom. A great investment! This elegant wristwatch was converted from pocket watch!!! This beautiful mechanical wristwatch has the original, highest Calibre pocket watch movement '' Jaeger LeCoultre '' with 15 Ruby Jewels. In an excellent status which was very well saved, considering age of this watch. Signed : '' Jaeger LeCoultre / Swiss made ''. CALIBER 467/2. Smooth and strong running of the balance. Movement has been recently serviced to ensure it winds and sets smoothly while keeping great, accurate time! This astonishing timepiece has Original Oversized case that provides with glass cover of back lid. Fully engraved!!! This watch was converted from pocket watch! The case is in good overall cosmetic condition, with soft signs of time or wear. The case have crown for winding and setting at 12 o'clock position. The watch supplied with a brand new genuine leather Luxury strap as a Free Gift to the buyer. See the photos for more details!!! Diameter watch without the crown: 51,5 mm.Diameter watch with the crown: 55 mmThickness watch: 17 mm. These watches have originally been made in a variant of a pocket watch. And in a consequence have been altered in a variant for convenience of carrying on a hand!!! This amazing timepiece has new impeccably renovated original white, enameled dial, was made in 2017. In exellent cosmetic condition, no signs of any scratches, cracks or hairlines. The dial have black Arabic numerals and sub dial at 6 o'clock position. The dial is signed : '' Jaeger - LeCoultre / Swiss made ''. And both mineral crystal glasses are brand new ones! See the photos for more details!!! ANY DEFECTS NOT MENTIONED BUT VISIBLE IN THE PICTURES WILL BE CONSIDERED AS DESCRIBED! Please serious bidders only, bidders with 0 feedback please contact me before you bid. For the rest of the bidders if you need to clarify any doubts you may have, please contact me! Please see my other auctions from time to time when I list other beautiful timepieces/ items!!!
